content:
JIN YU
3361 Cardinal Drive, Niagara Falls, ON L2H 3A6
(905) 341-2031 | [seijinyu@gmail.com](mailto:seijinyu@gmail.com)

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Experienced Barista and Server with a demonstrated history of working in the food and beverage industry. Skilled in customer service, food preparation, and safety protocols. Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Journalism at Toronto Metropolitan University.

WORK EXPERIENCE
Barista, Starbucks, Lake St.
April 2021 - Present

* Curate drinks and food under high traffic and pressure times to ensure quality service
* Practice active safety and cleaning protocols to maintain a clean and safe working environment
* Perform early opening and closing duties, including cash handling and inventory management
* Form personal connections with customers to enhance their overall experience

Server, Twisted Vine Kitchen & Market, Virgil
June 2019 - June 2022

* Create a sophisticated and welcoming dining experience by ensuring proper table settings, lighting, and music
* Effectively take orders and serve guests their meals and drinks, providing recommendations when requested
* Perform opening and closing duties of restaurant and bar, including cash handling and inventory management

Social Media Coordinator, Dog’SPAw, Dunn St. Plaza
December 2019 - Present

* Develop and execute engaging and professional posts, highlights, and stories on Instagram to promote the business
* Implement marketing strategies to increase engagement and gain local popularity
* Respond to direct messages for bookings and provide additional information as needed

Barista, Starbucks, Skylon Tower
March 2019 - September 2019

* Take orders and make drinks and food in a timely fashion to ensure efficient service
* Maintain a positive and safe working space under high pressure, communicating effectively with coworkers to achieve goals
* Perform opening and closing duties, including merchandising and cash handling

EDUCATION
Toronto Metropolitan University, Toronto
Bachelor of Journalism, Expected June 2023

Brock University, St. Catharines
Bachelor of Business Administration, September 2019 - November 2021

A.N. Myer High School, Niagara Falls
High School Diploma, September 2015 - June 2019

SKILLS

* Intermediate speaking level in Korean
* Basic speaking level in French
* Customer service experience, including conflict resolution and problem-solving skills
* Ability to thrive under pressure and in a fast-paced environment

CERTIFICATIONS

* St. John’s Ambulance CPR
* Grade 8 Royal Conservatory
* Honours and Scholar’s student (90-95+ average)
* Smart Serve (2019)

EXTRACURRICULARS/ VOLUNTEER
LawPlus student

* Network with legal professionals and attend seminars on valuable work-life skills
* Work on projects based on real cases given by lawyers to gain practical experience

Teaching Assistant, Eden High

* Provide 1-on-1 assistance to students and grade and design lesson plans
* Give short lessons on topics of Law & History (Gr. 10-12) to support student learning

English Tutor

* Conduct 1-on-1 sessions on English writing and speaking for students ranging from SK to Gr. 12 to improve their language skills.
